channel.title: Drives on xkyle.com
channel.description: Recent content in Drives on xkyle.com

item.title: Failing Hard Drives
item.description: So lots of people use computers, and lots of people have harddrives. At my work I deal with lots and lots of computers and lots and lots of drives. So during a week I see plenty of failing drives, just because of the statistics. So now-a-days I run a “smart test” on the drive to see how it is. Unfortunately most drive testers and smart tests are crap. So I made my own and I want to share it with you….
